name: 4 Minute Work Week
description:
My Entry For Ludum Dare 46

ARROW KEYS + Z and X

ENTER KEY to view tasks

M to mute music

Loop around the office and solve the small tasks during your 4 minute work week - if you fail loop back and try again

The sound design was crazy last minute and I bearly got to work on the final day - but despite it all, I'm happy with what I have what I have learnt
